View on GitHub

LIBIS/AWare conformance checker

This webpage contains information about the LIBIS/AWare conformance checker for TIFF and is part of the Preforma project

On this website you will find:

  • the Functional Analysis of the LIBIS/AWare conformance checker
  • the Technical Design of the LIBIS/AWare conformance checker
  • the identification of preservation and data exchange problems in the TIFF specification. We selected a subset of the TIFF specification that are free from preservation and data exchange problems.
  • test files that illustrate the problems identified in the TIFF specification

Created by LIBIS and AWare Systems

All deliverables are available under the Attribution-ShareAlike 2.0 Generic (CC BY-SA 2.0)
